name: Aegiskin
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
Target's skin becomes metallic. Their damage reduction is increased by 10.

Whenever the target takes damage, the spell loses 1 damage reduction. When the damage reduction becomes 0, the spell ends.
empower: Choose one - the target becomes immune to fire and gains +1 damage reduction each time they would take fire damage, or the damage reduction can only be reduced to 5.
